metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3598 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write inextractContigSamplesShifted24bits in tools/tiffcrop.c:3604, allowingattackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For usersthat compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commitcfbb883b.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3598` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiff-tools - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiff5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6').
